fields.name: :pencil: Formatting Tips
fields.value:
**<argument>**: You need to include these
**[argument]**: These are optional

(Do not include the brackets in commands)

​

fields.name: :scroll: Poems
fields.value:
**%pend**: Ends a current poem*
**%pfrequency <time>**: Changes the frequency DokiBot grabs words*

​

fields.name: :smiling_imp: Insults
fields.value:
**%psubmit <insult>**: Submits an insult to DokiBot; include `%user%` where you want DokiBot to mention someone
**%ptoggle**: Turns off/on random insults*

​

fields.name: :regional_indicator_a: :regional_indicator_l: Anilist
fields.value:
**%panime <anime>**: Finds info on an anime
**%paniuser <username>**: Finds info on an anilist user
**%pcharacter <character>**: Finds info on an anime/manga character
**%pmanga <manga>**: Finds info on a manga

​

fields.name: :tada: Fun
fields.value:
**%pmoniquote**: Posts a random Monika quote from the end of DDLC

​

fields.name: :frame_photo: Images
fields.value:
**%pdoki [tags]**: Posts an image of a doki
**%pneko [tags]**: Posts an image of a beautiful neko girl
**%pwaifu [tags]**: Posts an image of a random waifu

​

fields.name: :sound: Sounds
fields.value:
**%pnep [character]**: Plays a soundclip from Hyperdimension Neptunia

​

fields.name: :cd: OST
fields.value:
**%pplay <number>**: Plays a track from the DDLC OST #1-15
**%pplayall**: Queues all tracks from the DDLC OST
**%plist**: Lists all songs from the DDLC OST and their numbers
**%pstop**: Stops the current song and clears the queue
**%ppause**: Pauses the current song
**%presume**: Resumes a paused song
**%pskip**: Skips the current song
**%pqueue**: Displays the song queue
**%pclear**: Wipes the entire queue

​

fields.name: :gear: Miscellaneous
fields.value:
**%phelp [command]**: Lists all commands or info about a specific command
**%psetchannel [channel]**: Changes the channel DokiBot will post insults and other messages to*
**%pprefix <new prefix>**: Changes the prefix used for DokiBot commands*
**%pvote**: Posts a voting link for DokiBot; voting resets cooldowns

​
